content: They can feel it all over... Stevie Wonder has been announced as the latest headliner for British Summer Time 2019, and he’s bringing along Lionel Richie too.The soul icon will take to the Great Oak stage on July 6 to perform what’s described as a “Celebration of Life, Love and Music” spanning his entire career. Tickets will go on sale from 9AM from Friday 29 March, starting at £69.95 for general admission.
